tldr: Affected versions of this package may expose sensitive information by invoking the `phpinfo(INFO_GENERAL)` function. This can reveal environment details such as PHP version and configuration, which could aid attackers in crafting targeted exploits.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `googleads/google-ads-php` library to a patch version.
